aprasymas.title: Moderni Tvora
aprasymas.text: „Moderni Tvora“ is a company offering contemporary fencing solutions. Our professional team, with many years of experience, helps you choose the best fence, gate, and wicket options for your company or private plot, and carries out all installation work.

box1.title: Why Us?
box1.text: „Moderni Tvora“ uses the most advanced equipment, ensuring precise project execution. Our assortment includes only the highest quality materials, guaranteeing the durability of fences, gates, and wickets for your company or home.

box2.title: Work Guarantee
box2.text: We guarantee the quality of our work: a 2-year warranty for installation services, a 5-10 year warranty for fences, and up to 45 years for the metal sheets we use.

box3.title: Live Consultation at the Office
box3.text: Visit the „Moderni Tvora“ office in Marijampolė, where you can see our materials assortment in person, consult with our specialists about your project, and receive professional advice.

card1.title: Custom Projects
card1.text: For non-standard plots, we prepare individual plans, taking into account the unique terrain of the area, ensuring a perfect fence fit for your property.

card2.title: Speed
card2.text: High-quality and fast project implementation from planning to fence installation – one of the fastest in the Lithuanian market.

card3.title: Modern Measurements
card3.text: Using the most innovative equipment, we create precise 3D plans of the area, reflecting the specific terrain of your plot.

card4.title: Full Project Implementation
card4.text: Our experienced teams ensure a smooth process, from the initial measurement to the final installation of fences, gates, and wickets.
